import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Undelete a room"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v2.0/locations/rooms/{roomId}/undelete"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Restores a previously soft-deleted room so it appears in active room lists again. Use this when a room was removed in error or when a room becomes available again.

**Prerequisites**
1. **roomId** - Use [POST /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/query](/docs/api/locations/query-location-rooms) with filters that include deleted rooms (if supported) to identify the room ID.

**Workflow Example**
1. Identify the deleted room ID.
2. Restore: [POST /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/\{roomId\}/undelete](/docs/api/locations/undelete-location-room).
3. Verify the room appears in standard queries.

**Minimal Required Fields**: roomId (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"roomId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"The unique identifier of the room to restore"},{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Bearer token for authentication"},{"name":"SiteId","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Site context for the request"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

Contains the ID of the deleted item.","properties":{"Id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the deleted resource"},"UserToken":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Authenticated session identifier"},"RequestDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the API processed the request"},"ExecutionTime":{"type":"number","format":"double","description":"Server-side execution time in milliseconds"},"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code"},"Message":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Optional informational message"},"ServerName":{"type":"string","description":"Application node that processed the request"},"ProcessId":{"type":"integer","description":"Internal process identifier for diagnostics"},"OperationId":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Trace identifier for log correlation"}},"required":["Id","StatusCode"],"title":"ItemDeleteResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"404":{"description":"Room not found"}}}
